Name: The Region
About the game: The Region - is an open world in which many actions are available to the player. The region is affected by an unknown virus that has destroyed almost all living things. There will always be danger waiting for you in the region. The goal is to survive. Explore the terrain, find weapons and supplies, create objects, improve equipment, protect yourself from dangerous enemies, fight other players or survive together.
